action.selector: TD[style="text-align: center; border: 1px dashed rgb(24, 130, 237); box-shadow: 3px 3px 3px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); padding: 3px;"]
DIV[style="height:100px !important; overflow:hidden; background:#8cc051 url(http://www.bulforums.com/source/public_html/images/bforums.jpg) no-repeat top left;"]
.imgNoBorder[style="float: left; background-color: lightgray; width: 300px; height: 250px; margin: 14px 0px 14px 8px"]

DIV[style="margin: 0px auto; min-height: 450px; width: 100%; padding-top: 500px; background-image: url('images/interface/kom_branding.png'); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: top center;"]
iframe[style="border: medium none ; margin: 0pt; padding: 0pt; overflow: hidden; width: 300px; height: 250px; border-collapse: collapse;"]
DIV[style="margin: auto; background-color: transparent; border-width: 0px; width: 300px; height: 250px;"]
DIV[style="width: 462px; padding:3px; margin: 10px 0px 0px 0px; min-height: 60px; border: #dddddd solid 1px;"]
ins[style="width: 970px; height: 250px; display: block; position: relative; border: 0px none;"]
ins[style="width: 970px; height: 250px; display: inline-table; position: relative; border: 0px none; vertical-align: bottom;"]
